examples.example: 我在洗手间认真地洗漱，准备开启美好的一天。

translate.english: I am washing and brushing carefully in the washroom, getting ready to start a wonderful day.

examples.example: 我在商场里找了好久，终于找到了洗手间。

translate.english: I searched for a long time in the mall and finally found the restroom.

examples.example: 每次出门前我都会先去洗手间整理一下自己的仪表，保持整洁干净。

translate.english: Every time before going out, I will go to the bathroom first to tidy up my appearance and keep it tidy and clean.
